item.description:
Julie, a TMIRCE Track Star veteran has a great fundraiser going down this night. Follow the link and let's get out there to support our community.

https://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=310544322293932&notif_t=event_invite

Andy
item.how_to_find_us: We're always outside with clothes on...clothing optional.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: TMIRCE veers off track - just tomorrow night
